<MethodEndpoint

Updates the details of the given organization.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orgId","in":"path","description":"Organization numeric identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Organization update request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"description":{"type":"string"},"logoId":{"type":"string"},"fullName":{"type":"string"},"website":{"type":"string"},"paying":{"type":"boolean","nullable":true},"location":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"}},"title":"UpdateOrganizationRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
